short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly preview HTML files on GitHub with our Chrome extension. One-click preview and easy access!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
[ Features ]
- Instant Preview: Click the preview button on any GitHub HTML page to see the rendered results in a new tab.
- Private Repository Support: Configure your GitHub token to preview HTML files in private repositories.

---------------

If any issues arise or if you have feature requests, please report them through issues or discussions on the repository
https://github.com/dohyeon5626/github-html-preview-extension
You are also welcome to report problems via email or through the web store.
